title: Man must explore, and this is exploration at its greatest
body: man must explore and this is exploration at its greatest problems look mighty small from miles up posted by start bootstrap on august never in all their history have men been able truly to conceive of the world as one a single sphere globe having qualities round earth which directions eventually meet there no center because every point or none an equal occupy equals airman's if free make it will be practice not theory science cuts two ways course products can used for both good evil but there's turning back early warnings about technological dangers also come what was most significant lunar voyage that set foot moon they eye chinese tale tells some sent harm young girl who upon seeing her beauty become protectors rather than violators that's how i felt first time could help love cherish those seen space hundreds perhaps thousands more experience certainly changes your perspective things we share our are far valuable divide us final frontier thought finishing aiming stars figuratively literally task generations matter much progress makes always thrill just beginning dreams yesterday hopes today reality tomorrow has yet mastered prophecy predict too next year little ten spaceflights cannot stopped work any even group historical process mankind carrying out accordance with natural laws human development reaching got further away diminished size finally shrank marble beautiful you imagine warm living object looked so fragile delicate touched finger would crumble fall apart change go places do done before that’s these voyages starship enterprise five-year mission strange new worlds seek life civilizations boldly where gone stand here wonders unknown hadley sort realize there’s fundamental truth nature placeholder text ipsum photographs nasa commons
